paragraphs.text: As you have seen, implementing a simple strategy is a matter of few lines of code!
Keep this in mind to deal correctly with Base and Quoted Asset. Base is on top, Quoted is at bottom! So in our case BTC/USD we have BTC is the Base Asset while USDT is the Quoted Asset
It doesn't change if you go Short. If strategy is Short then in the Open Stage bot will sell the Base Asset and later buy it back using Quoted Asset!
